titleStmt.title: The city-heiress, or, Sir Timothy Treat-all a comedy : as it is acted at His Royal Highness his theatre / written by Mrs. A. Behn.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627. Mad world, my masters.
Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640. Guardian.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for D. Brown ... and T. Benskin ... and H. Rhodes ...,

notesStmt.note: In great measure borrowed from Middleton's Mad world my masters, and from Massinger's Guardian. Cf. Summers, M., ed. Works of A. Behn, v. 2.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
